html:
8.14.20  5:42 pm   How to force money to grow on trees

      make a great product using the leaves

8.14.20  5:08 pm   Do you appreciate walruses and their achievements?

      yes, in fact many of my closest friends are walri

8.14.20  5:06 pm   Do we have free will?

      i do

8.14.20  4:57 pm   how do you make those cool funky chords sound good and make sense

      threaten them

8.14.20  4:53 pm   Are you a transcendent being from a different universe?

      i thought you were

8.14.20  4:39 pm   how many pants do you have?

      just 1. i have the ultimate pant

8.14.20  3:44 pm   Bill, whenever a song idea or a possible melody comes into my brian (out of nowhere mind you), Since I'm so caught off guard by it, and I know I'm gonna forget it, I record it using my breath and whistling in my phone. My question: Is that weird?

     no, that's professional. that's what professionals do, at the highest ranks of the business, in multiple industries

     Also: What would you do in that situation (say you're taking a walk or reorganizing your closet)

     exactly the same thing. Don't forget to provide ample contextualizing description, and especially a COUNT OFF!

8.14.20  3:27 pm   why are you making songs and videos for the rest of your life?

      it seems like a good idea at the time

8.14.20  3:24 pm   Why does 2020 suck? 

      this is due to the quantum law of observation, which means when someone observes something they think it sucks

8.14.20  2:30 pm   do you enjoy eating rubber bands in your free time?

      my time is actually very expensive

8.14.20  2:02 pm   What is the true meaning of "La de da de da de da de day oh"?

      songwriting

8.14.20  1:12 pm   What is your opinion on door handles?

      tasty, but you must learn the delicate art of RESTRAINT, and not lick them

8.14.20  12:37 pm   Are You Gonna Upload The Big Project This Year?

      the project i'm doing is not possible to upload all at once. the project is 'making videos and songs for the rest of my life'

8.14.20  11:44 am   how did you think of writing mount st helens is about to blow up

      i saw what looked like a huge duststorm outside the plane window. the whole world below was beige....i couldn't see anything. except a ridiculously huge mountain sticking through. i asked google what the huge mountain was, in that area, and it said it was probably mount st helens, and i said 'oh, i've heard of that'. that did not necessarily inspire a song yet. then i continued about my day, and then when i got to my hotel room, there was a painting of mount st helens there. kind of like how there's pictures of mt fuji all over japan, i suddenly got the idea that that mountain is a similar cultural icon in this place. so then it became obvious to do a song about it because it must be important

8.14.20  11:04 am   Please release hang me we've been waiting 5 years

      was never made. also i thought it was 6 years

8.14.20  11:03 am   Do you think music theory is mandatory to write good music?

      you'll have to try it and see

8.14.20  10:55 am   Why is your date format MM.DD.YY instead of the superior YYYY-MM-DD?

      i use yyyymmdd in all the places where it is superior, and not in the places where it is not

8.14.20  10:52 am   pls help music

      i'll see what i can do

8.14.20  9:48 am   Why does my mouse keep disconnecting?

      probably because it's wireless

8.14.20  9:45 am   how do i be cool?

      have dinner on top of the restaurant, instead of inside

8.14.20  9:28 am   why do people keep asking you why you don't use caps?

      they may have received some false information somewhere

8.14.20  9:22 am   are u an amazing alien sent here to teach us life lessons? 

      i thought you were

8.14.20  9:16 am   How do you think?

      impossible. it can't be done

8.14.20  9:10 am   is it good to be bad

      let me perform some calculations

8.14.20  8:26 am   How did you get so good at making music you musical lunatic? 

      kept a journal, of daily anguish

8.14.20  7:33 am   What are your thoughts on memes?

      the ultimate love child of religion and science

8.14.20  7:18 am   What was the strangest thing you heard?

      i have never heard a strange thing

8.14.20  7:04 am   Will you ever write a song about coronavirus

      i would rather write songs about other things

8.14.20  6:50 am   Your best tips to get motivation?

      that doesn't make sense to me. motivation is what helps you get OTHER things. if you don't have motivation then you probably wouldn't be bothered about it. and i just don't think you would have asked this. it sounds like you already have the motivation, and your next step should be logistics in actually doing the thing

8.14.20  5:55 am   What are you doing right now ?

     songwriting

      I heard you were working on your 3D modeling skills ?

      no, i never really got a chance to do that. so i'm still pretty much a toddler when it comes to modeling. i hope you're excited for all the basic shapes you're about to see

8.14.20  5:50 am   What are your thoughts on capitalism

      it's like going to the store, except the whole world is the store

8.14.20  5:40 am   Hey, Bill what notes does the Bsus7 chord consist of?

      ask the author. because Bsus7 is probably not something you've ever seen written anywhere else. so it's unclear what it's supposed to be. first i would ask them if they mean B7sus4, or Bsus4

8.14.20  5:30 am   How's that new video making software bud?

      not complete, but i will have to go ahead anyway

8.14.20  5:04 am   hey bill your music makes me cry and then feel happy. thank you. you're doing amazing things. 

      holy weather vane, you are very friendly

8.14.20  4:29 am   WHY DON'T YOU USE CAPS?

      sorry you got the wrong person. i use them all the time

8.14.20  4:01 am   how are you so cool

      due to the extreme levels of normalcy i have cultivated

8.14.20  3:02 am   Thoughts on rocks?

      too soft

8.14.20  2:33 am   Who let the dogs out? 

      i think the more important question is who imprisoned the dogs in the first place

8.14.20  1:49 am   how do you feel about the spanish inquisition

      i've been expecting it, but it never seems to arrive

8.14.20  1:16 am   What are your opinions on dictionaries?

      pretty good, but they don't tell you what whole sentences mean

8.14.20  12:18 am   Do you use auto tune

     no

      and if so, how much?

8.14.20  12:13 am   Have you ever actually been to New Canaan?

     yes

     Why did you write a song about it?

     because i was going there

      (Btw, I love that song, it really means a lot to me).

8.13.20  11:40 pm   opinion on bill wurtz

      fucking impossible

8.13.20  11:32 pm   What are your thoughts on hedgehogs?

      very generous. always sharing the hedges

8.13.20  11:08 pm   Why is world?

      because of you

8.13.20  10:35 pm   If you could live in a fruit, which one would you choose and why? 

      troposphere

8.13.20  10:34 pm   do you agree with the statement that your videos are the colors you see when you close your eyes and rub them

      no

8.13.20  9:49 pm   What is your most truthful opinion on bread

      can be squashed. squashability is an ever present feature of that item

8.13.20  9:08 pm   how do i stop myself from making the same song over and over?

      maybe handcuff yourself

8.13.20  9:04 pm   Is the sun a planet

      no but i can see why you would think that
